sub_title: Specialist Geophysicist at Shell Global Solutions International BV
summary: Specialist in electromagnetic geophysics with 15+ years of professional experience in research, implementation of software solutions and commercial deployment of newly developed tools. Currently providing technical support for electromagnetics and multi-physics applications throughout Shell. Have implemented various geophysical modeling and imaging software (mostly electromagnetic, some seismic), multi-physics inversion, data processing algorithms, and co-developed data acquisition hardware. Proficient in multiple programming languages and experienced with programming for high-performance computing environments.
